articles.title: UK seeks extradition of US woman over teen's death in crash
articles.description: Britain has sparked a diplomatic standoff with Washington by requesting the extradition of a U.S. woman over a road crash that killed a U.K. teenager
articles.content: Harry Dunn, 19, died in August after his motorbike collided with a car driven by Sacoolas outside RAF Croughton, a British military base in central England used by U.S. forces. Sacoolas, whose husband was an intelligence officer at the base, claimed diplomati… [+716 chars]

articles.author: Demetris Nellas | AP
articles.title: 12 migrants found dead, 21 rescued at sea off western Greece
articles.description: Greece's coast guard says 12 migrants have been found dead in the Ionian Sea and 21 others have been rescued after their boat took in water and sank
articles.content:
The initial report is that 50 people were in the boat, he said.
The coast guard said someone from the boat had called the 112 emergency number at 9:15 a.m. Saturday. At least four merchant ships, six coast guard ships and a helicopter were searching for surv… [+211 chars]

articles.author: Rahim Faiez | AP
articles.title: NATO: US army vehicle hit by roadside bomb in Afghanistan
articles.description: A roadside bomb hit a U.S. army vehicle Saturday in Afghanistan, both NATO and Afghan officials confirmed, without providing any details
articles.content:
An Afghan official said the attack had taken place in the Dand district of Kandahar province. The official was not authorized to speak with media and requested anonymity.
He added that there is no report on any possible casualties.
The Taliban now control o… [+410 chars]

articles.title: D.C.-area forecast: Unseasonably warm today and tomorrow, plus gusty showers late tonight
articles.description: Rain should generally cooperate if you have outdoor plans. Most of it falls while we sleep.
articles.content:
Todays daily digit A somewhat subjective rating of the days weather, on a scale of 0 to 10. 8/10: Way too warm for January, but I kind of like it. Express forecast

articles.author: Associated Press
articles.title: Fire engulfs nursing home in Croatia, 6 reported dead
articles.description: Croatian media say a fire engulfed part of a nursing home in northern Croatia early Saturday, killing at least six people
articles.content:
Croatian media said the fire erupted in a wooden building close to the main building of the nursing home. N1 TV said about 20 people were staying in the building when the fire broke out.
Police said the fire has been put out but they could not immediately en… [+337 chars]

articles.author: Associated Press
articles.title: IS claims Pakistan mosque bombing as death toll rises to 15
articles.description: Pakistani officials raised the death toll from a mosque bombing in the country's southwest to 15 people on Saturday, as the Islamic State group claimed responsibility for the attack
articles.content:
Quetta police chief Abdur Razzaq Cheema said another victim of the mosque bombing died of serious wounds in the city hospital raising the death toll to 15. He said two other victims were in critical condition.
The Islamic State group said the attack a suicid… [+655 chars]
